name: City Plaza
description: The city proper, where the statue of Dr. Jose Rizal and the tallest pylon in the Philippines sits (santarosacity.gov.ph). Most events are held in the Plaza like the Sikhayan Festival in which is celebrated on January 18.
commute: Ride a jeep with a sign "Bayan" or "Tagapo". The common fare rate is P10
address: Rizal Blvd, 4026, Brgy. Kanluran, Santa Rosa
